component.name: Scanline
component.summary: An unofficial native client for Plex

description.p: Scanline lets you browse your Plex media libraries, search across servers, and play content natively in a GTK4 / Adwaita interface.

ul.li: Multi-server support
Full-text search
Library browsing
Video playback
MPRIS integration
Scrobbling to ListenBrainz

description.p: Requires a Plex account and access to a Plex server.

screenshot.caption: Scanline displaying the public, unauthenticated home page
Scanline showing the search page, while displaying the lyrics of the current song

ul.li: Fixed an issue where we would not deallocate GObjects properly
Fixed an issue where the track list in the search UI was misaligned
Fixed an issue where repeating a track would not work
Fixed an issue where scrobbling could block playback
Fixed an issue where Scanline would fail to show window decorations when set to the left side
You can now configure whether Scanline should autoplay track radios after your queue ends
Added pagination to collection pages
Added sub-pages to all search result types
You can now configure your preferred maximum audio quality
You can now view your feed in Scanline
Fixed gapless playback not always being gapless
Fixed a bug where starting a track list in shuffle-mode would not shuffle the tracks
Improved compliance with the MPRIS spec, fixing an issue with the KDE media player applet
Improved accessibility by adding tooltips to all icon buttons
Added Secret Service self-test
Added French translations
Added Polish translations (LukaszH77)
Added support for custom ListenBrainz servers (thatonecalculator)
Added support for playing top tracks on the artist page
Added support for navigating backwards using the mouse button
Redesigned the sidebar player
Fixed a bug where shuffling an empty queue would crash the app
Fixed a bug where Scanline would always request the english home and explore pages
Now using the correct icons for skipping instead of seeking
Fixed a bug where large track lists would start overlaying after ~200 tracks
Fixed a rare concurrent map access that would crash the app
Scanline is now translated into German
Scanline now marks the currently playing track in the tracklists

description.p: Scanline now also has a Matrix room for contributions and issues!
Welcome to the first beta release of Scanline. In this version, we added, well, everything. Give it a look and let us know what we can improve!

ul.li: Home, Explore and Collection pages
View playlist, mixes, albums and artists
Search functionality
Play tracks, playlists, mixes and albums
Sing along with the lyrics tab
Control Scanline using MPRIS
Scrobble your listening activity with ListenBrainz
